thread.title: Elle Finn
thread.title_full: TShirt Studio reviewed by Elle Finn

author: Elle Finn
title: Elle Finn
text: Ordered t-shirt on Monday and phoned to confirm. Due to delays, they upgraded my order to express delivery, so it was supposed to arrive on Thursday. No sign on Thursday, so called them to check dispatch - no answer. Called Friday, Saturday and Sunday with still nobody picking up the phone which just rang out with no voicemail. Needed to t-shirt for a corporate event on Tuesday and Wednesday. Finally got in contact to discover the person who had dealt with my order had left the company and moved to Spain...T-shirt supposedly delivered on a pre 9am delivery for Tuesday morning... didn't arrive until midday Wednesday. Although a refund was issued, it didn't detract from the dreadful experience. Certainly won't be using them again.
